mapper.select: SELECT cr.class_registration_no, cr.lecture_no, cr.account_id, cr.class_registration_state, cr.class_registration_point, cr.class_registration_review, cr.class_registration_createdate, lc.lecture_no, lc.account_id, lc.subject_no, lc.teacher_name, lc.lecture_name, lc.textbook_isbn, lc.lecture_startdate, lc.lecture_enddate, lc.lecture_total, lc.classroom_no, lc.lecture_createdate, lc.lecture_updatedate, sj.subject_no, sj.subject_name, sj.subject_createdate, sj.subject_updatedate, sj.subject_totalday, sj.subject_info FROM class_registration cr LEFT JOIN lecture lc ON cr.lecture_no = lc.lecture_no LEFT JOIN subject sj ON lc.subject_no = sj.subject_no WHERE lc.lecture_no=#{lectureNo} GROUP BY lc.lecture_no LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{rowPerPage}

SELECT cr.class_registration_no, cr.lecture_no, cr.account_id, cr.class_registration_state, cr.class_registration_point, cr.class_registration_review, cr.class_registration_createdate, lc.teacher_name, lc.lecture_name, lc.lecture_total FROM class_registration cr LEFT JOIN lecture lc ON cr.lecture_no = lc.lecture_no WHERE cr.account_id=#{accountId} GROUP BY lc.lecture_no LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{rowPerPage}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM class_registration WHERE account_id=#{accountId}
